sections.subtitle: Dive In for a Chance to Launch Your Side Project at SXSW Interactive

sections.title: Ship to Win - Jan 31
sections.subtitle: Launch your project on ⋈ BowTie.io and win awesome prizes.

columns.title: Tools
columns.content: Win 1 year of free hosting for your project on ⋈ BowTie, premium support included. Plus full startup legal setup + trademark service from Lerner Venture Law

columns.title: Time
columns.content: 6 months free at ABQ's best coworking space: Fatpipe ABQ - including fiber internet, utilities, and access to other amazing entrepreuneurs.

columns.title: Exposure
columns.content: Grand prize winner will present their project at Startup Oasis during SXSWi in Austin on March 17th.

columns.title: More Prizes!
columns.subtitle: (Everyone Goes Home a Winner)
columns.content:
1st Runner Up:

  • 6 months free hosting on Bowtie
  • Startup Legal setup from Lerner Venture Law
  • BowTie.io Team Hooded Sweathsirts

Audience Choice:

  • 6 months free hosting on Bowtie
  • Occulus Rift Dev Kit 2!
  • BowTie.io Team Hooded Sweathsirts

All Competitors:

  • 3 months free hosting on BowTie
  • A pile of awesome merch from our sponsors.
  • Food, craft beer and fun at Demo Day reception on Feb.13th

countdown.complete: Registration is now closed. Please join us for Demo Day on Feb.13th at FatpipeABQ.

sections.title: Format + Rules
sections.body:
Teams (1-3 people, 30 teams Max) will compete by launching their projects on ⋈ BowTie's frontend hosting platform. Springboard begins with an intro and hackathon with the ⋈ BowTie founders on Jan 31st from 11:00a - 3:00p at FatPipe ABQ (lunch provided). Teams reconvene at FatPipe ABQ to present their projects at a public Demo Day on Feb. 13th.

Judges (TBD) will announce the Grand Prize, Runner Up and Audience Choice awards at 6:30p with a reception to follow (craft beer, snacks, music).

Every idea is valid, but we encourage software that can take advantage of the tools offered by the ⋈ BowTie MVP (software products, social sites, web applications, tools that leverage mebership, etc.). Competitors may be remote, but preference will be given to local participants as registration fills.

⋈ BowTie assumes zero ownership of any project created, we just want to help you get out the door.

sections.subtitle: ⋈ BowTie Springboard would not be possible without:
